snippet: Paul Auster, author of "The New York Trilogy" and other works, says he will not visit Turkey, nor China for that matter, as a way to protest the jailing of scores of journalists and writers. More surprising? Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan has...
abstract: Paul Auster, author of "The New York Trilogy" and other works, says he will not visit Turkey, nor China for that matter, as a way to protest the jailing of scores of journalists and writers. More surprising? Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan has taken note.

headline.main: A Brawl Over Turkish Press Freedom
